'''''"Spirit of the Fallen Dawnstar"''''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Duelist: Series II]]''.

The achievements are earned by defeating the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Iktomisaurus|text="Spirit of the Fallen Dawnstar" — All-Twisting Obsidian Storm}} while completing challenge conditions.
